com.yzong.dsf14.RMIFramework.examples

Class ZipCodeServerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yzong.dsf14.RMIFramework.examples.ZipCodeServerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ZipCodeServer, RMIRemoteStub

    public class ZipCodeServerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ZipCodeServer
    This class contains the actual implementation of ZipCodeServer, and the user essentially interacts with it via the RMI framework. It is not intended for local instantiation, but for being loaded by a RMI Service instance.
    Author:
    Jimmy Zong

        Description copied from interface: ZipCodeServer

        Parameters:
        newlist - ZipCodeList to load.

      • find

        public java.lang.String find(java.lang.String request)
        Description copied from interface: ZipCodeServer
        Finds the zip code of the given city.
        Specified by:
        find in interface ZipCodeServer
        Parameters:
        request - The city name whose zip code we wish to get.
        Returns:
        The zip code of the given city. Returns null if city name not found.

      • findAll

        public ZipCodeList findAll()
        Description copied from interface: ZipCodeServer
        Returns the current ZipCodeList of the object. In RMI framework, marshalled data is sent to the local (calling) site.
        Specified by:
        findAll in interface ZipCodeServer
        Returns:
        The ZipCodeList of current object.
